page.title: 16POLITICS IN AREA
page.content: Local Member of Parliament is Conservative Cabinet Minister Peter Walker. The County Councillor is Mrs. Liz Tucker (Liberal Alliance) and District Councillor is Len Cottrill (Conservative). The Parish Councils are non-political. North Piddle and Flyford are joined with Grafton Flyford in a combined Parish Council and the current chairman is Alan Gale of Lower Church Farm, Flyford. Naunton Beauchamp has its own Parish Council, chairman being Miss Noreen Smith of Copperfields, Orchard Lea, Naunton Beauchamp. Abberton has no Parish Council. Politics in this area are predominantly conservative with some Liberal Alliance support and tiny labour presence. Little activity outside election time apart from fund raising / social events and occasional Liberal 'Focus' newsletter.
